dcterms:creator: N. Codella
V. Rotemberg
P. Tschandl
dcterms:description: The ISIC 2018 dataset is used for skin lesion segmentation, comprising a total of 2594 images, with 2000 for training, 194 for validation, and 400 for testing.
dcterms:title: ISIC 2018 dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Jha
P. H. Smedsrud
M. A. Riegler
dcterms:description: The Kvasir-SEG dataset contains 1000 polyp images from colonoscopy video sequences, divided into 600 for training, 200 for validation, and 200 for testing.
dcterms:title: Kvasir-SEG dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Fumero

dcterms:description: The RIM-ONE dataset is utilized for optic disc segmentation, containing a total of 485 images, with 380 images for training, 50 for validation, and the rest for testing.
dcterms:title: RIM-ONE dataset
